mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENDER_TIME = #{tenderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RESPONSE_TIME = #{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_LEVEL = #{supplierLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACT_ADDRESS = #{extractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_REASON = #{addressReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where
ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION set PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENDER_TIME = #{tenderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESPONSE_TIME = #{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_LEVEL = #{supplierLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTRACT_ADDRESS = #{extractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT sc.*, CT."ID" AS ctid, CT.CATEGORY_NAME,CT.SUPPLIER_COUNT,CT.SUPPLIER_TYPE_NAME,CT.SUPPLIER_TYPE_ID,CT.CATEGORY_ID ,CT.IS_MULTICONDITION FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION sc LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CON_TYPE ct ON SC."ID"=CT.CONDITION_ID

SELECT sc.*, CT."ID" AS ctid, CT.CATEGORY_NAME,CT.SUPPLIER_COUNT,CT.SUPPLIER_TYPE_NAME,CT.SUPPLIER_TYPE_ID,CT.CATEGORY_ID ,CT.IS_MULTICONDITION FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION sc LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CON_TYPE ct ON SC."ID"=CT.CONDITION_ID WHERE sc.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId}
SELECT "COUNT"(*) FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION WHERE PROJECT_ID=#{projectId} AND STATUS=1

SELECT sc.*, CT."ID" AS ctid, CT.CATEGORY_NAME,CT.SUPPLIER_COUNT,CT.SUPPLIER_TYPE_NAME,CT.SUPPLIER_TYPE_ID,CT.CATEGORY_ID ,CT.IS_MULTICONDITION FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION sc LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CON_TYPE ct ON SC."ID"=CT.CONDITION_ID where sc.PROJECT_ID =#{projectId}
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORD_ID = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_NAME = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_REASON = #{addressReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where
ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_SES_EXT_TYPE_CATEGORY WHERE CONDITION_ID = #{conditionId} AND TYPE_CODE = #{supplierTypeCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_SES_EXT_TYPE_CATEGORY WHERE CONDITION_ID = #{conditionId} AND TYPE_CODE = #{supplierTypeCode}
